snippet: Ayad Akhtar’s “The Who and the What” and “Stop Hitting Yourself,” devised by the Rude Mechs, will be staged at the Claire Tow Theater.
abstract: Ayad Akhtar’s “The Who and the What” and “Stop Hitting Yourself,” devised by the Rude Mechs, will be staged at the Claire Tow Theater.

headline.main: New Play by Pulitzer Winner To Be Part of LCT3 Season
headline.print_headline: Play by Pulitzer Winner Coming to Lincoln Center
